Name: Take town
About the game: Urban Planning Simulator (puzzle) build and manage your city! You are the mayor of a small town develop it and earn money. in the game you will need to: build and hexagonal platforms to build a city and earn money as well as monitor the number of people because they make it possible to update the city hall buildings that will give more opportunities in the game
